about_the_game:
Dive into the very essence of survival and human ingenuity with Aerotopia, a unique survival game that melds magic and technology in an open, corrupted, and ever-evolving world.

🌍 Begin your journey in the Stone Age and carve a path through the ages, advancing technologically to build massive automated factories and take on the ultimate challenge of resource creation and management.

Character Customization 🔧



In Aerotopia, every stone, every blade of grass, and every drop of water can be key to your survival. Manage your thirst and hunger, cultivate land, raise livestock, and erect shelters to protect yourself from the elements. But survival doesn't end there. Your world is alive and reactive, filled with secrets and dangers, monsters drawn by mystical catalysts that promise rewards while posing deadly risks. Your ability to defend your domain and leverage these events can make the difference between prosperity and downfall.

Explore, Help the Villagers, and Rebuild 🏚️



Discover ancient ruins and rebuild a forgotten village to its former glory. Along the way, you’ll meet villagers who can assist you in your journey. Each NPC brings unique skills: the lumberjack will cut and store wood for you, the mechanist can boost your machines' speed, and more. Together, you can forge a thriving settlement in the skies of Aerotopia.

Conquer the Skies with Advanced Technology


The beating heart of Aerotopia lies in its sophisticated and evolving machinery. Unlock and master an array of complex machines that turn survival into a symphony of industrial efficiency. But why stop there? Build flying ships to explore floating islands, establish trade routes, and transport resources across your ever-expanding domain.

Basic Machine Setup ⚙️



  • Smelters: Transform raw ore into pure metal, laying the foundation of your technological ascent.

  • Alloy Smelters: Combine metals to create strong alloys for advanced structures.

  • Containers: Store resources in large quantities to ensure uninterrupted production.

  • Assemblers: Automate crafting and free your hands for greater innovation.

  • Sawmills: Process wood into essential building components.

  • Mining Machines: Extract resources automatically, fueling your constant progression.


Every machine in Aerotopia is a step toward greatness. Expand your empire across the skies, transforming a magical world into an industrial utopia. The future of Aerotopia rests in your hands.

Key Features


  • Donjons, Quests, and Ancient Mysteries: Embark on thrilling adventures in dungeons and complete quests to uncover the hidden history of Aerotopia.

  • Rebuild and Thrive: Restore a forgotten village and watch as NPCs assist you in building a prosperous future.

  • Flying Machines: Craft and customize flying ships to explore, trade, and transport goods.

  • Mechanical Wings: Soar through the skies with customizable wings powered by your machines.

  • Farm Monsters for Rewards: Create mob farms to generate gold, legendary equipment, and rare artifacts.

  • Pets: Tame adorable companions like kittens to aid you in your adventures.

  • Survival and Evolution: Start with nothing and advance technologically towards a fully automated age.

  • Epic Bosses and Artifacts: Defeat colossal bosses guarding artifacts that enhance your industrial empire.


Aerotopia offers an unprecedented survival experience where every choice, every invention, and every battle shapes your destiny. Forge your future and help the ancient people of Aerotopia recover from their tragic past. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey from Stone Age to industrial power in Aerotopia, where survival meets automation in a magical, corrupted world. Face bosses, harness artifacts, and build a mechanical empire.

English*, French
